knimeNode.name: Keras MaxPooling2D Layer
knimeNode.shortDescription: A layer that performs a max pooling operation on spatial data.

fullDescription.intro: A layer that performs a max pooling operation on spatial data. Corresponds to the MaxPooling2D Keras layer .
fullDescription.option: Factors by which to downscale (vertical, horizontal). (2, 2) will halve the input in both spatial dimension. If only one integer is specified, the same window length will be used for both dimensions.
Strides values. If only one integer is specified, the same stride will be used for both dimensions.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a MaxPooling2D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added MaxPooling2D layer.
